pr_title: Enhance DataTypeTransformer to handle nested Map/List/Object[]

timeline.message: Enhance DataTypeTransformer to handle nested Map/List/Object[]

timeline.author: siddharthteotia

replies.bodyText: I think Line 138 in DataTypeTransformerTest.java is the example that we expect.
replies.author: jackjlli

timeline.message: Add test case for Object[] of multiple single-entry Maps

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a simple comment here on why it should fail (because of single value column)?
timeline.author: jackjlli
jackjlli

timeline.bodyText: Can we add more description on what this method does and what should be the expected behavior?
timeline.author: jackjlli

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/pinot-core/src/main/java/org/apache/pinot/core/data/recordtransformer/DataTypeTransformer.java b/pinot-core/src/main/java/org/apache/pinot/core/data/recordtransformer/DataTypeTransformer.java index 2849274102..ccdda3307c 100644 --- a/pinot-core/src/main/java/org/apache/pinot/core/data/recordtransformer/DataTypeTransformer.java +++ b/pinot-core/src/main/java/org/apache/pinot/core/data/recordtransformer/DataTypeTransformer.java @@ -118,6 +118,11 @@ public class DataTypeTransformer implements RecordTransformer { /** * Standardize the value into supported types. + *
    + *
  • Empty Collection/Map/Object[] will be standardized to null
    • + *
  • Single-entry Collection/Map/Object[] will be standardized to single value (map key is ignored)
    • + *
  • Multi-entries Collection/Map/Object[] will be standardized to Object[] (map key is ignored)
    • + *
*/ @VisibleForTesting @Nullable

timeline.bodyText: There is no need to have an extra check here since it's been covered in Line 89.
timeline.author: jackjlli

replies.bodyText: Perform this check before standardizing the value to prevent the extra record.putValue()
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: It'd be good to include test which value can be converted to other type like 100, 200 to make sure the output converted value should be the correct one.
timeline.author: jackjlli
